title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Surface structures, relaxations and reconstructions; Adsorption, desorption and diffusion; two-dimensional reciprocal lattice and crystal truncation rods; Physics of ultra-high vacuum (UHV); Reciprocal space mapping - Grazing angle Xray diffraction (GAXRD), Electron diffraction, X-ray reflectivity (XRR), X-ray standing wave (XSW) analysis; Ion scattering techniques - Particle induced Xray emission (PIXE) and Secondary ion mass spectroscopy (SIMS); Surface magnetism; X-ray magnetic circular dichroism (XMCD).
